mapper.sql: id, merchant_name, merchant_id, trade_amount, trade_count, agent_id, parent_agent_id, agent_level, log_id, is_original, gmt_created, gmt_modified
mapper.insert: insert into tb_trade_import_detail(merchant_name, merchant_id, trade_amount, trade_count, agent_id, parent_agent_id, agent_level, log_id, is_original, gmt_created, gmt_modified) values ( #{merchantName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeAmount, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tradeCount, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{agentId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentAgentId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{agentLevel, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isOriginal, jdbcType=TINYINT}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT log_id, agent_id, agent_level, parent_agent_id, SUM(trade_amount) as sum_trade_amount, sum(trade_count) sum_trade_count FROM tb_trade_import_detail where log_id = #{logId, jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY agent_id
